about_message:
CrazyOnes is a Telegram bot that keeps you updated on Apple's operating system and software releases.

Type /help for information on how to interact with the bot.

Developed by Geek-MD
help_updates: â€¢ /updates - Show last 10 updates in your language
help_updates_tag: â€¢ /updates [tag] - Show last 10 updates filtered by tag (e.g., /updates ios)
help_language: â€¢ /language [code] - List languages or show updates (e.g., /language en-us)
help_description: This bot monitors Apple's software update releases and sends you notifications when new updates are available.
